name: Pan-Em-Up
description:
HTML5 Version of our game is downloadable on this page. We made this game as our final project in our UI Design class. The controller is a pan. There are 2 button. A jump button on the pan handle and the other button is the action of slamming the pan on an object. This was made possible by makey-makey.

Logan Mayo: Programmer, Game Design

Scott O'Neill: Engineer, Artist, Game Design

Elanora Fabrino: Engineer, Artist, Game Design

Shaun Stevenson: Sound Design, Game Design

Seth Constant: Artist, Game Designer
